title: Pantheon Splash art on in client store
body:
http://imgur.com/pVrVWd7

This link provides a screenshot of Pantheons splash art in the store, it is incorrect.

replies.body: KateyKhaos saw at least one [previous bug report](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/F3ZtWrKe-pantheon-store-icon?comment=00010000) about this already. Should be getting fixed soon.
